category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_load_lov
preference.preference_description: Activates the Portal's load LOV performance transaction. This measures the elapsed time from selecting an LOV to the display of all objects in the list. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the load LOV performance transaction. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the load LOV performance transaction.
